entry.title: What One Would do for One Goal
entry.summary:
Author: Chocolates_Flavor_is_Macha

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,880Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 203

Summary: Kim Seungmin's shop is almost completely done, but he needs one more thing. He needs a simple acceptance from the secret governing Magical Counsel, but they won't allow the young witch a shop without protection. He either needs a coven, or he needs a familiar, and he wants neither. This is because of his own past dealing with covens and his own personal family history. But he cannot legally run his shop without the Counsel's acceptance. With no signs of an answer, one of the biggest Crime bosses, Bahng Christopher Chan, just so happened to fall right into his backyard—a hole in his chest and little to no chance of surviving this. Well, Seungmin could do a lot worse than a powerful man like Chan. And besides, the Crime Boss has his own reason for survival, a simple goal that both men can accept. But it seems there's a lot more going on underneath the surface in both their lives, and they both have to work together to achieve their goals. Or die trying.

entry.title: Escape the Silence
entry.summary:
Author: KiaoweLaccu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,957Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: This is a sequel and does not stand alone. Please read A Prison of Red Lights first. Thanks! Run… …the wind whispered in the night, a familiar keening under the gaze of the half moon. …run… The whisper grew, echoing off the broken walls, building to a crescendo, the staccato of panting breaths keeping in rhythm with the wind’s urgent cry. Moonlight flashed in faded blue eyes as they turned pleading to the moon above. …run! Their prison of Red Lights left behind them, Chan and Hyunjin follow a call as they desperately seek to escape the burning world around them, guided by the moon and their love for each other. Involves my own loose interpretation of wolf and moon mythology.DISCLAIMER: While they share names and appearances, this is based on the characters portrayed in the videos, not the idols themselves.

entry.title: Forever is Not Long Enough
entry.summary:
Author: velvetgloss

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,829Chapters: 7/16Kudos: 141

Summary: "Happy collaring day, baby." Chan murmurs into his skin."Sorry." Felix says. "I didn't mean to wake you up.""'S alright," Chan says, pulling Felix in closer. "Rather be awake with you than sleeping anyway. Been awake long?""Not really." Felix says. "I just can't sleep anymore. I'm too excited.""Yeah?"Chan's little laugh, sleep-rough and pleased, warms his skin, and Felix can't help but bite his lip. He curls his foot around Chan's ankle, shifting closer as Chan's hand skates over his skin, over his hip, his thigh, until it finds its way to wrap around his cock. His touch is light, barely there, and still Felix shudders into it."Pretty baby," Chan says approvingly. "Half-hard just from thinking about my collar, little one?"OR,When Felix and Chan venture outside of their cozy, kinky bubble for a trip home to share the news of their engagement, they reckon with their past selves and confront the effects of the very different ways they’ve loved each other. Featuring a collaring and a proposal, joyful reunions and many difficult discussions with parents, marginally successful attempts to curtail their 24/7 dynamic and what Chan calls 'denial play on Extra Hard mode'.

entry.title: A Prison of Red Lights
entry.summary:
Author: KiaoweLaccu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,686Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 125

Summary: Dark, faded blue eyes flashed with moonlight. “Let me go,” whispered Hyunjin, but his plea was met with a cold and unyielding stare. In a flash of almost inhuman speed, he was on his feet and the chains pulled taut as he strained against them. “I didn’t do anything! Let me go!” Chan didn’t flinch even as Hyunjin’s face came within centimeters of his own. “You exist.” The chains stopped clanking as Hyunjin relaxed, leaning against the pull of the chains, giving his body the oddly distorted look of a marionette tangled in its strings, accentuated by the red glow overhead. He looked up at Chan again, their eyes meeting. Then he spat on his face. Or my interpretation of the music video, "Red Lights" and how "Escape" is a continuation of the same story. A hunter and his captured prey grapple for control as they discover a connection deeper than their ingrained hatred for each other. Involves my own loose interpretation of wolf and moon mythology.This is part one. "Escape" will be part two.DISCLAIMER: While they share names and appearances, this is based on the characters portrayed in the videos, not the idols themselves.

entry.title: Low Heat, Slow Burn
entry.summary:
Author: sankissedphia

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,659Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 30

Summary: Moving back home was supposed to be temporary—a reset button after life knocked you flat. You didn’t expect the man next door to be the one lighting a fire under your skin.Christopher—"just call me Chris, kiddo"—is your dad’s new best friend, heartache still lingering in his eyes and a grill spatula always in hand. He’s older. Off-limits. Constantly shirtless. And dangerously easy to want.Late summer heat, shared glances across the yard at the neighborhood cookout, and midnight kitchen run-ins turn into something neither of you meant to start. But some things have a way of burning slow, then scorching.

entry.title: Black Rose
entry.summary:
Author: minniepens

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 99,700Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 1,002

Summary: Kim Seungmin had everything—a perfect life with great grades, a loving family, and friends who admired him. He was popular and successful, with a future that looked bright.But one day, Seungmin made a heroic choice to save a child from a truck and ended up dying. When he woke up, everything had changed. He was in a dark, dangerous place filled with crime and violence, far from the life he knew.Now, Seungmin is stuck in this grim world with seven others, all trapped in a harsh reality. His perfect life is gone, and he's left to navigate this new, frightening existence. Can he find a way out, or will he remain lost in this dark abyss?
